results.name: Samsung Galaxy
results.phoneDescription: The Samsung Galaxy S7 boasts a 5.1-inch Super AMOLED display ideal for gaming. It also comes with expandable storage plus an ergonomically engineered metal body and compact curved rear design.

results.name: Sony Xperia
results.phoneDescription: Featuring Sony's best smartphone camera to date, the waterproof Sony Xperia Z5 is packed with premium features including a 5.2-inch full-HD TRILUMINOS display, hi-res audio, 4K video recording and a 2-day battery.

results.name: HTC One A9
results.phoneDescription: With the HTC One A9's premium metal case, 5-inch full HD 1080p display, 13-megapixel camera and ultra-efficient Snapdragon 617 octa-core processor, you can do more of what you want.

results.name: Microsoft Lumia
results.phoneDescription: The Lumia 550 is a 4G smartphone full of brand new Windows 10 features. Whether you want to work on the go, capture memories with friends or simply relax, it's your perfect companion.

results.name: iPhone 5
results.phoneDescription: With 3D Touch, Live Photos, 7000 series aluminium, A9 chip, advanced cameras, 4.7-inch Retina HD display and so much more, you’ll see how with iPhone 6s, the only thing that’s changed is everything.
